mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID ,ROLE_CODE ,ROLE_DESC ,PARENT_ROLE ,STUS ,ROLE_LEV FROM SYS0044M SROLE START WITH SROLE.PARENT_ROLE = #{parentRole} CONNECT BY PRIOR SROLE.ROLE_ID = SROLE.PARENT_ROLE ORDER SIBLINGS BY SROLE.ROLE_CODE

SELECT STATECODE.STATE_ID, STATECODE.CODE, STATECODE.NAME, STATECODE.CNTY_ID, STATECODE.STUS_CODE_ID, STATECODE.CRT_DT FROM SYS0035M STATECODE WHERE STATECODE.STUS_CODE_ID = #{stusCodeId} ORDER BY STATECODE.NAME ASC
